1: <pb/><t>Kas chupam ri najil</t> <t>ri in c'o wi</t> <t>quintz'onoj bic che la, Ajawaxel;</t>
2: <t>tatabej la, Ajawaxel, ri nu ch'abal,</t> <t>chutatabej ri xiquin la</t> <t>ri nu rak'oj chi'aj</t> <t>che u tz'onoxic tok'ob.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ajawaxel, Ajawaxel,</t> <t>we ta ma ta quesach la qui tza'm</t> <t>ri etzelal,</t> <t>¿jachin ta lo ri'</t> <t>ri cäcuinic co cätaq'uic?</t>
4: <t>Uc' c'u la cäkarik wi cuyubal macaj,</t> <t>rech cäkaya' k'ij la.</t>
5: <t>Ruc' ronojel ri nu c'aslibal</t> <t>quineyen che ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>quinjiquiba' c'u nu c'u'x</t> <t>chrij ri u tzij.</t>
6: <t>C'o na ri reyexic ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>quinbano chquiwäch</t> <t>ri caquiban chajinelab</t> <t>pa ri sakaribal.</t> <t>Je e jacha' ri caquiban ri chajinelab</t> <t>quebeyen pa ri sakaribal,</t>
7: <t>chaweyej at Israel, ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ruc' c'u are' c'o wi lok'ok'ebal c'uxaj</t> <t>xukuje' tz'akatalaj to'tajem.</t>
8: <t>¡Are' quesan na ri Israel</t> <t>chupam ronojel ri retzelal!</t>
